An health inventory item in Strife that gives 25 health. ==== DECORATE definition ==== ACTOR MedicalKit : {{Class|HealthPickup}} { {{Property|Health}} 25 +{{Flag|FLOORCLIP}} +{{Flag|INVENTORY.INVBAR}} {{Property|Inventory.MaxAmount}} 15 {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_MEDICALKIT" // "Medical kit" {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} "I_MDKT" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_MEDICALKIT" // "You picked up the Medical kit." {{Property|HealthPickup.AutoUse}} 3 States { Spawn: MDKT A -1 Stop } }
